name: Balloon Boy (itch) (surlo)
description:
Controls: [A] [D] / [<] [>] - move

bounce on birds to not die, get balloons and big birds for more points.

In case if you understand my bad story telling through pictures, it's about a boy failing school and under stress and he floats up to escape all the pressure.

Credits:

RememberNovemeber on scratch for the inpiration behind the art style.

Music: things won't be the same - frad
